Shareholder Name: Mazin Bin Mohammed Bin Abdulrahman Al Saeed

Description: Aseer Trading, Tourism and Manufacturing (known as: Aseer) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Aseer operates within the Diversified Financials sector focusing on Multi-Sector Holdings. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia and Egypt. Aseer is based in Abha, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1975.
Company Name: Aseer Trading, Tourism and Manufacturing Co (4080)
